scope_1.note: Estimated based on 30% of Net Scope 1 & 2 total (8.8 ktCO2e), assuming the remaining portion after Scope 2 is Scope 1. Note: Net Scope 1 & 2 is 8,800 tCO2e.

scope_2.note: Estimated based on 70% of Net Scope 1 & 2 total (8.8 ktCO2e), as the vast majority (70%) is linked to purchased electricity. Note: Net Scope 1 & 2 is 8,800 tCO2e.
